title: Let “soft news” lead to hard conversations
description: Every fall, in my Principles of Journalism in Democracy course — which includes nearly 250 first-year students — I ask: Where do you get your news? Students think for a moment and then begin to jump in with the usual suspects: The New York Times, NPR, NBC, the Associated Press, etc. Then I ask: Okay,...
